_header: He that will all peril flee

BLRoy12Fxiii.First Lines: He that wyll all parell ffleehe must with wysdom armyd bee…
BLRoy12Fxiii.Last Lines: …And from foly kepe ay ffareAnd euer in welth be thow ware
